changePasswordStep.title: Password renewal
changePasswordStep.description: Your password either expired or has been revoked, you must provide a new password to continue.

totpStep.title: 2FA - Authenticator
totpStep.description: Your account is protected with 2FA through authenticators, please provide your code to proceed.

requestNewPassword.title: Request a new password
requestNewPassword.successMessage: You should receive an email with a link on the email address associated to this username. The link is valid up to 10 minutes from now.

newPassword.title: New password
newPassword.successMessage: Your password has been updated, you may now try to sign in.
